Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1972...
Earned first career win on 7/28/1978...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1981...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/2/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 7/11/1984 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1985 (Going to CHC: P E. Glynn. Going to NYM: P K. Clay)...
Released by Chicago (N) on 4/18/1986...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Houston in 1987...
